name: react-native-nitro-zlib
description: Node.js Zlib implementation for React Native using Nitro Modules and Rust
author: iwater <iwater@gmail.com>

scripts.copy-clib: rm -rf ios/Frameworks/RNZlib.xcframework && cp -R ../rust_c_zlib/target/xcframework/RNZlib.xcframework ios/Frameworks/ && mkdir -p android/libs/arm64-v8a android/libs/armeabi-v7a android/libs/x86 android/libs/x86_64 && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/i686-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/x86_64/
scripts.copy-clib-android: cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/i686-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_zlib/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librust_c_zlib.so android/libs/x86_64/
